  • Constructor Details

    • SIGALIB

      public SIGALIB(String user, String password)
      Constructs a new SIGALIB object with the specified user and password.
      Parameters:
      user - the username for authentication
      password - the password for authentication

  • Method Details

    • get_user_info

      public String get_user_info() throws IOException
      Retrieves user information from a web page and returns it as a formatted string.
      Returns:
      A string containing the user information.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while retrieving the web page content.

    • get_classes

      public ArrayList<String> get_classes() throws IOException
      Retrieves a list of classes from the SIGALIB system.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of strings representing the class names.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while retrieving the classes.

    • get_schedule

      public ArrayList<String> get_schedule() throws IOException
      Retrieves the schedule from the home page.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Strings representing the schedule.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while retrieving the schedule.

    • get_frequency

      public Map<String,String> get_frequency() throws IOException
      Retrieves the frequency information from the SIGALIB system.
      Returns:
      a map containing the frequency information, where the keys represent the frequencies and the values represent the corresponding results.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while retrieving the frequency information.

    • get_grades

      public Map<String,Map<String,String>> get_grades() throws IOException
      Retrieves the grades for the user.
      Returns:
      a map containing the grades, where the keys are the course names and the values are maps containing the grade details (e.g., assignment name and score)
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while retrieving the grades
